description: A navigation drawer that can be swiped in from the left edge of the screen. Can contain any kind of widgets. It may be useful to include a `PageSelector` that displays all top-level pages.

open.description: Fired when the drawer is opened and has reached its resting position.

close.description: Fired when the drawer is closed and has reached its resting position.

open.description: Opens the drawer. It may be useful to call this method on first startup, so that users notice the drawer and its contents.
